body_html:
Hi JimmyKon
I reinstalled bazel, even got fresh clone of tensorflow in different area. But the errors remain
gopi@gp:~/tensorflow$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer
.
ERROR: no such package '@local_config_cuda//crosstool': BUILD file not found on package path.
ERROR: no such package '@local_config_cuda//crosstool': BUILD file not found on package path.

Anyone succeeded with this combination ?
OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Cuda toolkit 8.0, cudnn-8.0-linux-x64-v5.1, GPU nvidia 1070, nvidia driver 370.23.

Repeated installation of ubuntu, toolkit, nvidia drivers, tensorflow many times in the last 3 weeks. still no luck with GPU based run.
But cuda toolkit examples are working fine Ex: bilateral filter and also CPU only version of tensorflow binary working fine.

Davidzchen,
I got python error and it disappeared using sudo ./configure.

Note: I mentioned compute capability as 6.1 (not visible in previous mail) for my nvidia 1070 card

Regards
Gopi. J
